original_text: Jesus did not say anything to the woman. So his disciples came to him. They said, ‘Please, send this woman away. She is following us and she is making a lot of noise.’
korean_text: 예수는 한 말씀도 대답하지 아니하시니 제자들이 와서 청하여 말하되 그 여자가 우리 뒤에서 소리를 지르오니 그를 보내소서

sentences.original_text: Jesus did not say anything to the woman
sentences.korean_translation: 예수님은 그 여자에게 아무 말씀도 하지 않으셨습니다

sentences.original_text: So his disciples came to him
and she is making a lot of noise
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그녀가 큰 소리를 내고 있습니다
